Uses of Package
micropolisj.engine

  • Packages that use micropolisj.engine 
    Package Description
    micropolisj.engine
    Contains the backend classes that implement the actual city simulation.
    micropolisj.gui
    Contains the front-end user interface that drives the game.
  • Classes in micropolisj.engine used by micropolisj.engine 
    Class and Description
    BudgetNumbers
    The information generated by the generateBudget function.
    CityBudget 
    CityDimension
    Encapsulates the width and height of a rectangular section of a Micropolis city.
    CityEval
    Contains the code for performing a city evaluation.
    CityLocation
    Coordinates of a location (x,y) in the city.
    CityProblem
    Enumeration of various city problems that the citizens complain about.
    CityRect
    Specifies a rectangular area in the city's coordinate space.
    Disaster
    Lists the disasters that the user can invoke.
    EarthquakeListener
    The listener interface for receiving earthquake notifications.
    MapListener
    The listener interface for receiving notifications whenever a tile on the city map changes, or when a sprite moves or changes.
    MapState
    Lists the various map overlay options that are available.
    Micropolis
    The main simulation engine for Micropolis.
    Micropolis.FinancialHistory 
    Micropolis.History 
    Micropolis.Listener
    The listener interface for receiving miscellaneous events that occur in the Micropolis city.
    MicropolisMessage
    Enumeration of every possible message for the user generated by the game engine.
    MicropolisTool
    Enumerates the various tools that can be applied to the map by the user.
    Sound
    Enumerates the various sounds that the city may produce.
    Speed
    Lists the simulation speeds available.
    Sprite
    Represents a mobile entity on the city map, such as a tornado or a train.
    SpriteKind
    Enumeration of the various kinds of sprites that may appear in the city.
    TileSpec 
    TileSpec.BuildingInfo 
    ToolEffectIfc 
    ToolPreview 
    ToolPreview.SoundInfo 
    ToolResult
    Lists the various results that may occur when applying a tool.
    ToolStroke 
    ZoneStatus
    Contains the information generated by the query tool.
